title: Snevagten
description: The Snevagten Partner App makes the work of salting and snow removal in winter easy, fast and safe. The app collects everything you need on the go - so you can focus on your work and complete tasks.

title: OK
description: The OK app lets you refuel, wash, park, and charge your car anywhere in Denmark, pay easily, earn Coop bonuses, and manage everything from your phone.

title: coto
description: coto provides live streaming led real-time consultations in Tarot, Astrology, relationships, mental health, emotional wellness, and Energy-based healing, creating a safe and supportive space for individuals, especially women, to find immediate and long-term support.

title: TapsellPlus SDK
description: Tapsell.orgâ€™s SDK lets developers add and manage ads in mobile apps, using its own and other ad networks through mediation to boost revenue with minimal setup.

title: Pushe SDK
description: The Pushe Android SDK adds push notifications, in-app messaging, and analytics to your app with support for both Google and Huawei devices.
